experience_teachers: Learn from teachers who work with programming!
about_1: The Cubos Tecnologia experience now in the classroom. diced Academy offers technology courses for all profiles, from beginner to advanced, in several areas: Android, Backend, Frontend and UX/UI Design - all this with the experience of someone who lives the day-to-day of the market for over 7 years.
about_2: We live in a time of constant transformation. Every day there is a new way of thinking and doing what has been done for decades in a certain way. We believe in education as a transforming element and in this process, the primary material is not machines, but people. It is the people who can build this new world, with more opportunities and more talent for the market. Cubos Academy was born with this objective: to train new talents connected with the demands of the technology area.
